features.heading: Book a Taxi Anywhere in the Netherlands
features.description1: Taxiritje makes it easy to book a taxi to any location in the Netherlands and major airports. We work with certified taxi companies to ensure reliable and high-quality service.
features.description2: Book online for airport transfers, business trips, healthcare visits, festivals, or day trips. Choose from standard, luxury, electric, or minibus transport. No extra luggage fees, and you can modify or cancel your ride for free up to three hours before departure.

local.title: Local taxi services
local.description: Through our website you can order a taxi from and to any location in the Netherlands. It doesn't matter if you need a taxi within 20 minutes or book your ride in advance.

airport.title: Airport taxi
airport.description: You can easily book a taxi to and from airports in the Netherlands, Germany and Belgium. We keep an eye on your flight and wait if delayed.

care.title: Care transport
care.description: We offer tailor-made care transport for people who are unable to travel themselves. For patient transport from or to healthcare facilities.

business.title: Business transport
business.description: For business taxi rides, we are the ideal service in the Netherlands. Companies can easily order taxi rides on account with a business account.

popular.title: Popular Locations
popular.description: Our drivers ride to and from popular locations in the Netherlands. Perfect for trips to amusement parks, zoos, theaters or stadiums.

event.title: Event Transportation
event.description: Perfect for parties, festivals or other events. No one has to stay sober; after the event we will bring you home safely.

orderConfirmation.question: How do I know if my order has been processed?
orderConfirmation.answer: You will receive a confirmation via email.

otherAirports.question: Can I book a taxi for airports other than Schiphol?
otherAirports.answer: Yes, you can book a taxi for airports other than Schiphol. We provide transportation to and from all airports in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany.

confirmationEmail.question: Will I receive a confirmation after booking a taxi?
confirmationEmail.answer: You will receive a confirmation via email.

nationalCoverage.question: Can I be picked up anywhere in the Netherlands?
nationalCoverage.answer: Yes, that's possible. If your location is not listed under 'rates', please contact us for a quote.

pickupLocation.question: Where will I be picked up at Schiphol?
pickupLocation.answer: You are expected at departure hall 3 exit C of Schiphol. In case of delays, you can count on us to monitor them closely. After arriving at the airport, please turn on your mobile phone so the driver can reach you.

multipleAddresses.question: Can we be picked up at different addresses?
multipleAddresses.answer: Yes, you can! It costs €10 extra per additional address within the same city and €20 extra per address in another city.

whereToSpecify.question: Where can I specify my address?
whereToSpecify.answer: You can specify the additional address in the remarks section of the booking form.

stationWagon.question: What is the maximum amount of luggage I can take in a station wagon?
stationWagon.answer: A station wagon taxi can accommodate 4 large suitcases and 4 cabin trolleys.

bus.question: What is the maximum amount of luggage I can take in a bus?
bus.answer: A taxi bus can accommodate 8 large suitcases and 8 cabin trolleys.

fixedRate.question: Does Taxi Ritje charge a fixed rate for rides to Schiphol?
fixedRate.answer: We maintain fixed rates for taxis to and from Schiphol.

passengers.question: How many passengers can ride in a taxi?
passengers.answer: A station wagon taxi can accommodate up to 4 passengers, while a taxi bus can transport up to 8 passengers.

howToPay.question: How can I pay for my booked ride?
howToPay.answer: At Taxi Ritje, we maintain a prepayment policy for all our rides. This ensures a smooth, reliable, and worry-free journey for both you and our drivers. We thank you for your understanding and look forward to bringing you safely and comfortably to your destination!

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my trip?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel your trip 12 hours before departure without any charges.

wheelchair.question: Can I take a wheelchair in the taxi?
wheelchair.answer: This is only possible with a foldable wheelchair.

bicycle.question: Can I take my bicycle in the taxi?
bicycle.answer: Only if you're going to Schiphol and your bicycle is already packed in a box, it can be transported in a taxi bus.

pets.question: Can I take my pet in the taxi?
pets.answer: Pets are only allowed in the taxi if they are in a bag or carrier.

childSeat.question: Do you have child seats in the taxi?
childSeat.answer: In the Netherlands, children are allowed to ride in a taxi without a child seat. Babies can be held on the lap, and older children can sit in a regular seat with the seatbelt on.

howToFile.question: How can I file a complaint?
howToFile.answer: You can submit your complaint via the contact form or email us at info@taxiritje.nl

assistance.question: Does the driver help with getting in and/or lifting my luggage?
assistance.answer: Yes, every driver helps with getting in and/or handling luggage.
